materials.raw_text: O: 18 g, P: 6 g, Rb: 2 g, Sr: 2 g

sourcing.instructions: O: Purchase from chemical supply stores, P: Available at laboratory suppliers, Rb: Online specialty chemical suppliers, Sr: Chemical supply companies
steps: O: Purchase from chemical supply stores, P: Available at laboratory suppliers, Rb: Online specialty chemical suppliers, Sr: Chemical supply companies
1. Measure 18 g of oxygen (O) using a precise scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 18 g of oxygen (O) using a precise scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 800 °C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 800 °C.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally, which may take 6-8 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally, which may take 6-8 hours.

steps: 1. Remove the cooled crucible from the furnace.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the cooled crucible from the furnace.
